Get in Touch
We want to hear from you. Your questions and concerns are of the utmost importance to us. Please use the form below to request additional information about our course, services and promotions. We’d also like to encourage you to voice any concerns you may have and let us know how we’re doing in our efforts to provide the best facility we can possibly provide.
First Name

Your Message
Consent

privacy policy
.

Banquet Events
Jensen Beach Golf Club
Banquet Events at Jensen Beach Golf Club
Whether you are planning a birthday, anniversary, organizational luncheon, club gathering or even a wedding, the banquet hall offers you a great alternative to the norm.
Our no-hidden-fee room rental program allows you to enjoy our quality and elegance at sensible prices. We will coordinate with you and create delicious dishes to treat your guests. Breathtaking views of the 18th green and natural surroundings will add a unique touch to your event pictures and videos. Our dedicated staff will cater to your needs and work hard to make your event a success.
We are conveniently located right off Jensen Beach Blvd in Jensen Beach, the heart of the Treasure Coast of South Florida. From formal to relaxed or intimate to grand – we can help bring it to life
Contact Us

.entry-header
Membership
Jensen Beach Golf Club
Membership has Its Benefits
If you have you been looking for a new club to call home, you have just found it. Perhaps one with a top notch golf course, plenty of social events for the entire family and even events for that special day.
Our plan offerings are designed to encourage those who have a true passion for the game of golf and believe Jensen Beach Golf Club is the golf facility to satisfy that passion. .
Members will find great golf, a friendly inviting atmosphere and a special bond with the staff at Jensen Beach Golf Club. If you are an individual or couple, you will have the opportunity to make new friends and create life long memories. Whether you are coming for the golf, social events or that special occasion, we will make you feel right at home.
Contact Us Today
Golf Membership Pricing (2024 - 2025)
Gold Membership
Unlimited Access to Golf Course
Unlimited Complimentary Range Balls
Unlimited Access to Practice Facilities
Unlimited Access to our Member's Only Locker Room Lounge
Complimentary Locker
Complimentary Golf Bag Storage
Free USGA GHIN Handicap
Permission to Operate Private Cart
Club Account Charging Privileges
Major Brands Club Fitting Opportunities
7-day Advance Tee-Time Bookings
Trail Fee of $19.95 all year
10% Discount on all Food & Non-Alcoholic Beverages
10% Discount on Apparel & Select Pro-Shop Merchandise
10% off Public Rates for 3 Accompanied Guests (5 rounds per year maximum)
5% off Simulator Usage
Invitations to Social Events
10% Discount on Club Hosted Events

Consecutive 6-Month: $3,395

Annual Program: $149.95

Junior Membership Program
Annual Program: $599.95
Jensen Beach Golf Club is committed to fostering the future for our passionate next generation of golf enthusiasts. We want to promote and support their drive and desire in this game and in life and look forward to providing a safe haven at our Club for each amazing young player to have a place of their own.
Special Offers & Packages
Driving Range Only Membership - Yearly
Unlimited access to our Driving Range & Complimentary Range Balls
Unlimited Access to our Practice Facilities and Putting Greens
1 Free 18-hole round of golf between 6/30/25 & 9/30/2025
5% off all food & non-alcoholic beverages
5% off all apparel & select pro shop merchandise
Driving Range Only Membership - Monthly
Unlimited access to our driving range & complimentary range balls
Unlimited access to our practice facilities and putting greens
Driving Range Only Membership Pricing
Yearly Membership: $599.95
Monthly Membership: $99.95
Family Add on Membership Package
All added family members must be under 18 years of age
50% discount off junior membership for each additional child added
Yearly Family Membership: $699.95 (add up to 3 additional family members)
Club Credit Reward Bonus Program
Refer any new member purchasing a full price membership (new joining member must not have been a member in the previous 24 months)
Provide personal golf cart when purchasing a full price membership (must use approved member cart in lieu of club carts for each round played, when possible)
Club Credit Reward Program
Bonus Program: $250.00
Offers, Discounts, or Memberships may not be combined unless stated
Pro shop discounts do not apply to already reduced prices or sales items
Members must show proof of insurance for personal golf cart privileges
All rates, discounts, packages, or details are subject to change at any time
Discounts apply to card holders and members only
Taxes, Terms & Conditions
Taxes are not included on any above listed memberships or rates
Annual memberships are valid for 365 days from the date of purchase
6 Month memberships are valid for 6 consecutive months from purchase date unless prorated
Additional Special Discounts off advertised membership rates may be available [See Discounts below]
Offers and/or discounts may not be combined or bundled unless otherwise
Drink vouchers must be used the day provided and are restricted to soda and select beers only
Available Discounts
5% off any membership for country club or village residents
5% off First Time Members or Past Returning Members. (Only for New Residents, First Time Applicants or Previous Returning Non-Active Members over the last 24 months).
BOGO 50% off Couples Purchasing Memberships in Pairs. (Purchase any full price individual membership and receive a 50% discount off any other full price membership for your spouse. This discount applies only to legal couples who reside in the same residence. Proof of residence is required).
Contact Us

Bermuda Grass
Jensen Beach Golf Club is an 18 hole Tommy Fazio designed golf course, ranked by Golf Digest as #1 New Course in America upon its opening. Jensen Beach Golf Club is undergoing improvements, renovations, and restorations focused on bringing the course back to its original pristine conditions and a place for the community and its guests to enjoy. Five tee boxes offer a challenge for all skill levels and provide 6,923 yards of championship golf from the back tees, with a rating and slope of 74.5 / 145.
Jensen Beach Golf Club is a semi-private golf club that welcome members and non-members alike, taking pride in the quality of experience they can provide and listening closely to guest feedback.
Jensen Beach Golf Club offers a private-course experience and amenities without the private course price tag, featuring a restaurant, venue and bar. PGA Professionals are available for private or group lessons, 300+ yard driving range with grass and mat hitting options, and a well stocked pro shop including a discount program for members.
In addition to restoring the course back to its original shape and condition, we are also incorporating new technology and upgrading the entire facility creating a destination for all.
Memberships at Jensen Beach Golf Club are available and flexible for all budgets. Offering Annual Memberships, Seasonal Memberships, Summer Memberships, Junior Memberships, and more.

Practice Facilities
Our 300+ yard golf range offers both grass hitting areas and state-of-the-art artificial turf, which is ideal for use during wet ground conditions. To offer you a realistic golf experience, we maintain a high standard on our range balls. At Jensen Beach Golf Club we have two practice green areas as well as a practice bunker.
